item.title: Other Curriculum Development & Direct Teaching
item.description: Miscellaneous Older Curriculum Development 2013-2015Co-founder, Medical Education Track I worked with Vice Chair for Education Dr. David Thomas to develop a Medical Education Track for the Internal Medicine Residency Program at Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai. I developed a curriculum outline and assessment methods, and facilitated implementation of a pilot track year beginning in July 2015 (after my completion of residency). The [track](http://icahn.mssm.edu/education/residencies-fellowships/list/msh-internal-medicine-residency/education/categorical) is still active under the leadership of Dr.
